common.comingSoon: Properties coming soon. Check back shortly.

home.heroDescription: With personalized service in {{languages}}, I'm dedicated to making your real estate journey seamless and successful.
home.aboutPreviewP1: As a Residential Real Estate Broker at RE/MAX 3000 Inc., I bring dedication, market knowledge, and a personal touch to every transaction. Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or rent in Montréal, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.
home.aboutPreviewP2: Fluent in English, French, and Greek, I serve a diverse clientele across Montréal's vibrant neighborhoods — from the Plateau to Villeray, Saint-Laurent to Ville-Marie.
home.tranquilliT: Broker participating in the Tranquilli-T program
home.tranquilliTDesc: Exclusive protection to safeguard you in 4 components
home.buyingDesc: Find your dream home with expert guidance through every step of the buying process.
home.rentingDesc: Discover rental properties that match your lifestyle and budget in Montréal.
home.sellingDesc: Maximize your property's value with strategic pricing and professional marketing.
home.testimonial1: Theodora made our home-buying experience seamless. Her knowledge of Montréal's neighborhoods is unmatched.
home.testimonial2: Professional, responsive, and truly cares about finding the right fit. We couldn't have asked for a better broker.
home.readyToFindDesc: Whether you're buying, selling, or renting, I'm here to help. Let's start a conversation about your real estate goals.

propertyDetail.inquirySentDesc: Thank you for your interest in this property. I'll review your message and get back to you shortly.
propertyDetail.inquireDesc: Interested in {{title}}? Send me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
propertyDetail.tellMeInterest: Tell me about your interest in this property...
propertyDetail.inquirySentSuccess: Your inquiry has been sent. I'll get back to you soon.

contact.thankYouDesc: Thank you for reaching out. I'll review your message and get back to you as soon as possible, typically within 24 hours.
contact.formDesc: Have a question about a property or looking to buy, sell, or rent? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about what you're looking for...
contact.getInTouchDesc: Feel free to reach out directly or visit the office.

about.title: A broker with true dedication
about.bioP1: As a dedicated Residential Real Estate Broker at RE/MAX 3000 Inc., I bring a passion for helping clients navigate the Montréal real estate market with confidence and ease. Whether you're a first-time buyer, looking to sell, or searching for the perfect rental, I provide personalized service tailored to your unique needs.
about.bioP2: Fluent in English, French, and Greek, I serve a diverse clientele across Montréal's vibrant neighborhoods. From the artistic energy of Le Plateau-Mont-Royal to the family-friendly streets of Saint-Laurent, I know the city inside and out.
about.bioP3: My approach is built on transparency, responsiveness, and genuine care for my clients' goals. I believe that finding the right home is about more than square footage — it's about finding a place where life happens.
about.officeDesc: Located in the heart of Montréal, our office is easily accessible and ready to welcome you. Feel free to stop by or schedule an appointment to discuss your real estate needs.

selling.title: Sell Your Property
selling.subtitle: We bring expertise, market knowledge, and a proven track record to help you achieve the best result.
selling.soldDesc: Browse our recently sold properties and see what we've achieved for our clients.
selling.conciergeDesc: Talk to our AI assistant — ask about listings, schedule viewings, or get answers.
selling.appraisalDesc: Get a free, no-obligation market appraisal of your property's value.

buying.title: Find Your Dream Home
buying.subtitle: Whether you're looking for your first home or a prestige property, we're here to help.
buying.forSaleDesc: Browse current listings for sale from Centris — Montreal's largest real estate platform.
buying.secretDesc: Be the first to know about off-market listings.

renting.title: Find Your Rental
renting.subtitle: Quality rental properties across Montréal. Find your next home.
renting.forLeaseDesc: Browse available rental properties from Centris.

sold.label: SOLD PROPERTIES

sold.subtitle: See what we've achieved for our clients. Our track record speaks for itself.
sold.noSold: No sold properties to display yet. Check back soon.

footer.taglineDesc: We bring people together with homes using local knowledge and strong market experience.
footer.subtitle: Residential Real Estate — Montréal
